fullText: [1] St. Ephrem Eccumenical Research Institute, Kerala, will be organizing the Vth World Syriac Conference. The conference will be held at the Institute's headquarters in Kottayam, Kerala State, India, and is scheduled to take place between September 8, 2002, and September 14, 2002. [2] Scholars who are interested in attending may contact Dr. Jacob Thekeparampil, Director of SEERI. E-mail: seeri@sancharnet.in. Tel. no. 0091-481-564333.
title: Vth World Syriac Conference, SEERI, Kottayam, India, 8-14 September 2002
Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies
author: Thekeparampil, Jacob
displayTitleEnglish: Vth World Syriac Conference, SEERI, Kottayam, India, 8-14 September 2002
